title: HOUR 3- Kirk Herbstreit and Joe Montana 081220
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Kirk Herbstreit and Joe Montana 081220
description:
Kirk Herbstreit fresh off his Emmy Win last night, ask Dan why cant all the doctors from all the power 5 conferences get on the same page. Joe Montana says that Jimmy Garoppolo needs to keep his head up and keep his confidence. Joe says on that pass to Dwight that helped them win the Super Bowl over Dallas; that they had never actually thrown the ball to Dwight in the past and that Dwight was only to set the pick for some one else to get open for the pass.
